title: Request - Folder Access
description: A user requests access to a network folder that they currently cannot open.

tasks.description: Identify the folder in question and find its designated owner in the documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician finds the data owner for the folder.

tasks.description: Forward the access request to the data owner for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: An approval request is sent to the correct person.

tasks.description: Once approval is received, add the user to the appropriate Active Directory security group to grant them access.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user is granted access after approval is obtained.
